title: 84x6: Conflict of Interest Issues Raised by Spouse’s Employment on Retainer with a Government Contractor
summary: OGE advised agency counsel that while an employee's spouse who worked on a retainer basis for a contractor might not have a financial interest for purposes of disqualifying the employee under 18 U.S.C. § 208 from participating, the relationship created a high degree of appearance of impropriety, and the employee should not participate.
